name: Disc Derby: Meiba o Tsukurou!!
overview: Disc Derby - Meiba wo Tsukurou!! is a mix between a breeding game and a simulation game. The game features 2 different helpers at the beginning of the game (a male or a female one) that the player can choose. The player can choose a CD to uso to create the horse after that train it, buy horses, go to horses bids to bid for them and buy them for his stable, and compete in the different races that are around Japan.
